bios.Aleksandar Karadjov: Dedicated ambassador passionate about cultural exchange and community projects.
bios.Aleksandra Kostova: Committed to educational initiatives and youth leadership development.
bios.Daniel Kolev: Enthusiastic about environmental sustainability and green initiatives.
bios.Georgi Pazhev: Focused on digital innovation and technology in education.
bios.Ivanina Pavlova: Young ambassador with passion for cultural heritage and traditional arts.
bios.Kiril Kalachev: Dedicated to promoting intercultural dialogue and understanding.
bios.Magdalena Ivanova: Committed to social justice and community service projects.
bios.Maksim Akimov: Passionate about STEM education and scientific innovation.
bios.Maksim Ralev: Focused on sports, health, and active lifestyle promotion.
bios.Plamena Gospodinova: Dedicated to arts, creativity, and cultural expression.
bios.Simeon Sabev: Committed to humanitarian causes and global citizenship.
bios.Tina Tuncheva: Leader in European integration projects and international cooperation.
bios.Valeri Yankova: Enthusiastic about language learning and multilingual communication.
bios.Vasilena Veselinova: Dedicated to environmental protection and sustainable development.
